quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Concentration is the secret of strength.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Focus is the key to unlocking your potential.
author: Anonymous

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Focus on the possibilities for success, not on the potential for failure.
author: Anonymous

quote: Where focus goes, energy flows.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Your focus determines your reality.
author: George Lucas

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
author: John Carmack

quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Focus on the solution, not the problem.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don't confuse movement with progress. A rocking horse keeps moving but doesn't make any progress.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: Energy flows where attention goes.
author: Michael Beckwith

quote: It is not enough to be busy… The question is: What are we busy about?
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The ability to focus attention on important things is a defining characteristic of intelligence.
author: Robert J. Shiller

quote: An eagle never loses sleep over the opinion of pigeons.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Always remember, your focus determines your reality.
author: Qui-Gon Jinn (Star Wars)

quote: Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful.
author: John Maeda

quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Focus means eliminating distractions, not just ignoring them.
author: Anonymous

quote: He who chases two rabbits catches neither.
author: Russian Proverb

quote: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: When you have clarity of intention, the universe conspires with you to make it happen.
author: Fabienne Fredrickson

quote: Your results are the product of either personal focus or personal distractions. The choice is yours.
author: John Di Lemme

quote: The successful person has the habit of doing the things failures don’t like to do.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
author: William James

quote: Do more of what matters and let the rest go.
author: Anonymous

quote: The first requisite for success is the ability to apply your physical and mental energies to one problem incessantly without growing weary.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
author: H.L. Hunt

quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Successful people maintain a positive focus in life no matter what is going on around them.
author: Jack Canfield

quote: You don’t need more time in your day. You need to decide.
author: Seth Godin

quote: That's been one of my mantras - focus and simplicity. Simple can be harder than complex.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Focus is more important than intelligence.
author: Herb Kelleher

quote: Multitasking is a lie.
author: Gary Keller

quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.
author: LL Cool J

quote: The only thing that stands between a man and what he wants from life is often merely the will to try it and the faith to believe that it is possible.
author: Richard M. DeVos

quote: Focusing is about saying No.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The more you can focus on one thing at a time, the more you’ll get done.
author: Leo Babauta

quote: Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Starve your distractions, feed your focus.
author: Anonymous

quote: Focus is the secret of all greatness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: To be everywhere is to be nowhere.
author: Seneca

quote: Only the man who does not divide his attention can hope to succeed.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The focus of your life should be on the path, not the obstacle.
author: Anonymous

quote: I don't care how much power, brilliance or energy you have, if you don't harness it and focus it on a specific target, and hold it there you're never going to accomplish as much as your ability warrants.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It is not the daily increase, but daily decrease. Hack away at the unessential.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there.
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: Concentration can be cultivated. One can learn to exercise over a body, mind and emotions.
author: Anil Ambani

quote: What we focus on, we empower and enlarge.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Focus is like a laser beam. It can cut through the most difficult obstacles.
author: Anonymous

quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: You only have a certain amount of energy. To get things done, you have to focus.
author: Doris Kearns Goodwin

quote: Deep work is the ability to focus without distraction on a cognitively demanding task.
author: Cal Newport

quote: Your focus is your greatest asset.
author: Anonymous

quote: When we focus on our gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out and the tide of love rushes in.
author: Kristin Armstrong

quote: The direction of your focus determines the direction of your life.
author: Anonymous

quote: You can do anything, but you can't do everything.
author: David Allen

quote: I focus on one thing and one thing only – that is trying to win as many championships as I can.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Be silent and safe; silence never betrays you; Be true to your word and your work and your friend.
author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quote: Concentration is the root of all the higher abilities in man.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Focus on being the best version of yourself.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you chase two rabbits, you will not catch either one.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Do it with passion, or not at all.
author: Rosa Nouchette Carey

quote: I have learned that focus is the key to success. If you can't focus, you can't succeed.
author: Apolo Ohno

quote: Focus on the process, and the results will follow.
author: Anonymous

quote: Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: Socrates

quote: Focus on the light, and you will find your way.
author: Anonymous

quote: Focus is the ability to stay on track when things get tough.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The power of focus is the power to change your life.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
author: Anonymous

quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Success demands singleness of purpose.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Distraction is the enemy of greatness.
author: Anonymous

quote: Focus on where you want to go, not on what you fear.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The mind is like a magnifying glass; when it focuses, it creates fire.
author: Anonymous
